name: Cyberpunk Story
description:
Cyberpunk Story visual novel

My first Ren'Py visual novel. Revolving around nonsensical events happening in big city. In a dystopian cyberpunk setting. 

Play it if you like really brain eating jokes.

In this game you'll hear about things like chicken revolution, a cyber squirrel, an angry computer sacrificing cats, cyber zombies, crazy clowns, evil puppies, etc.
